amendment.description: To require that the Medicare plan, to be known as the Medicare Guaranteed Option, be available to all eligible beneficiaries in every year.

vote.text: Amendment SA 931 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 37 - 58. Record Vote Number: 227.

action.text: Amendment SA 931 proposed by Senator Stabenow. (consideration: CR S8089-8098, S8099-8105, S8108-8109; text: CR S8089) To require that the Medicare plan, to be known as the Medicare Guaranteed Option, be available to all eligible beneficiaries in every year.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 931 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 37 - 58. Record Vote Number: 227.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 931 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 37 - 58. Record Vote Number: 227.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 931 proposed by Senator Stabenow.
